participant_1.background:
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.
I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

participant_2.background:
My days are filled with creating projects and keeping in touch with my family.
I'm more of a homebody, but I do enjoy the occasional day out with my cats.
I'm not really concerned with my appearance, I'm much more interested in creating and expressing myself.
my neighbor comes over all the time to watch rugby with me.
I take walks with my mom and do yoga at home.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I really enjoy creating projects and spending time with my family and cats.
That sounds nice. Do you have a favorite project you've ever worked on?
I made a beautiful necklace out of some old jewelry and beads. I love it!
Wow, that sounds lovely. I'm not very creative, but I admire people who are.
I'm sure you're creative in your own way!
I hope so! I like to take walks with my mom and do yoga at home.
That's really nice! I like to go for walks with my neighbor, but I'm not much of a yogi.
Do you have a favorite yoga pose?
I like the tree pose. It's really challenging, but it feels good when you get it right.
I've never tried it! I'll have to give it a go.
You should! It's a great way to stretch and relax.
Thanks for the tip! I'm always looking for new ways to stay active.
You're welcome! I love talking about yoga
